name: Graveyard-Hunter
description:
You woke up on a haunted graveyard and your aim is to kill as much ghosts as you can.

Graveyard-hunter offers you:

- An endless difficulty, which increases by your score.

- An atmospheric mood 

- No jumpscares ^^

  And lots of fun!

Important Information:

The controls:

Move: WASD

Shoot: Left Mouse Button

Sprint: Left Shift

Pause the game: "TAB" key  (In the downloadable Version too)
